entities.name: imperius curse
entities.description: A spell that gave the Ministry trouble at one time. It is mentioned as 'the Imperius Curse'.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: An organization that was given trouble by the Imperius Curse.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person who knows about the Imperius Curse and has a jar with spiders in it.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: An animal that is used to demonstrate the Imperius Curse.

relationships.description: Moody knows about the Imperius Curse.
The Ministry was given trouble by the Imperius Curse.
Moody has a jar with spiders in it.
